text:
@BrianKarem @PressSec @realDonaldTrump The most informed president on planet earth?What a joke! 

What did he do with Coronavirus info he received, since he's the most informed? 
Over 127k dead under him even with information, so without information  millions would have died by now. 

DERELICTION OF DUTY & INEPTUDE!.
